text: avar, unmaiyana attatcikalai avarkalitam kontucenra potellam atarkavarkal, ‘‘(musavai) nampikkai kontiruppavarkalutaiya an makkalai kolai ceytu, pen makkalai uyirutan vala vitunkal'' enru (tan makkalukkuk) kurinarkal. Akave, innirakarippavarkalin culcci valikettileye tavira (veru etilum) cellavillai
